title: SNOW PLOW VS SNOW PUSHER: WHICH ONE IS RIGHT FOR YOU?

tasks.task: Determine which snow removal equipment (plow or pusher) is better.
subtasks: Compare price points between plows and pushers.
Discuss design and construction of the Tar River snow pusher and HLA snow plow.
Explain the benefits and limitations of snow pushers and plows in terms of steering, load distribution, and snow handling.
Consider the suitability of each tool for different driveway and property sizes.
Conclude that snow pushers are generally better for larger areas and simpler operation, though individual needs vary.
